scripts.laprak: sh -c '[ -z "$npm_config_modul" ] && echo "Error: Parameter --modul (modul) dibutuhkan!" && exit 1; [ -z "$npm_config_file" ] && echo "Error: Parameter --file (file) dibutuhkan!" && exit 1; mkdir -p ./laprak/$npm_config_modul/build && gcc ./laprak/$npm_config_modul/app/$npm_config_file.c -o ./laprak/$npm_config_modul/build/$npm_config_file.exe && ./laprak/$npm_config_modul/build/$npm_config_file.exe'
scripts.praktikum: sh -c '[ -z "$npm_config_modul" ] && echo "Error: Parameter --modul (modul) dibutuhkan!" && exit 1; [ -z "$npm_config_file" ] && echo "Error: Parameter --file (file) dibutuhkan!" && exit 1; mkdir -p ./C++/$npm_config_modul/build && gcc ./C++/$npm_config_modul/app/$npm_config_file.c -o ./C++/$npm_config_modul/build/$npm_config_file.exe; ./C++/$npm_config_modul/build/$npm_config_file.exe'
